explains: adj. 不忠实的；不诚实的；不准确的

sentences.en: Have you ever been unfaithful to him?
sentences.cn: 你对他是否有过不忠行为？

sentences.en: He vowed to wreak vengeance on his unfaithful, thieving wife.
sentences.cn: 他发誓要报复对自己不忠、爱偷东西的妻子。

sentences.en: She was shocked by the discovery that he had been unfaithful.
sentences.cn: 她发觉他不忠时感到非常震惊。
